Units

Class UnitPainter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Units.UnitPainter

  • public class UnitPainter
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that does nothing but draw hexes! Right now it's somewhat closely tied to MapWidget, but if you ever need to draw hexes outside of the map you could probably use or tweak it

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UnitPainter(double hexRadius)
      Constructs a unit painter, loads all relevant images
